page.title: 10HOUSING IN HURST GREEN
page.content: { Hurst Green} is small and compacted and has about 2,000 houses. Many of the houses are semi-detatched and were built between 1947 and 1960. 70% of the houses are large and have plenty of space, 20% are old peoples flats and a further 9% are flats,the remaining 1% are bungalows. About 75% of the houses around this area were built by the County Council and the other 25% were built by various other private building companies. Alot of the area is made up by new building estates,for example{Barnfield Way,} which was once a field. All of the{ {Greenways}is now a building estate but was once all woodland. Many other new houses have been built in small spaces available.
